title: How to Be Super-Cool w/ RoosterTeeth's Gavin Free - Gregway Episode 14
description:
You know who the coolest person at RoosterTeeth is? It's Gavin Free. Today, he shares his secrets with us. DON'T YOU WANT TO BE SUPER-COOL?!

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Leave your questions for Greg and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

The Gregway playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6

Subscribe to Greg: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Subscribe to RoosterTeeth: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=roosterteeth

Subscribe to theslowmoguys: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=theslowmoguys

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Follow Gavin on Twitter: http//www.twitter.com/gavinfree

Follow RoosterTeeth on Twitter: http//www.twitter.com/roosterteeth
